name: deNewer
description:
deNewer is about controlling a tape called K7 to make it reach the end before it is rewound.

K7 can move around 2D platforms and has a time limit to finish each level. If it cant reach the end of each level before the time, it will be rewound until the last checkpoint. Player score will be the time left after completion of each level minus the total of times rewound.

There are 5 levels.
